sense.gloss: to understand, to comprehend, to grasp, to see, to get, to follow
to become clear, to be known, to be discovered, to be realized, to be realised, to be found out
I know!, I think so too!

sdata.j: ↑豚↑↓ぶた↓の↑気持↑↓きも↓ちがよく|↑解↑↓ほどけ↓る|、↑食↑↓く↓いっぱぐれはないが↑飢↑↓う↓えている。
sdata.e: I know how Piggy feels. He starves without missing a meal.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑様子↑↓ようす↓から↑見↑↓み↓て↑病気↑↓びょうき↓だということが|↑解↑↓ほどけ↓る|。
sdata.e: I can see he is ill by his appearance.

sdata.j: ↑病気↑↓びょうき↓になってはじめて↑健康↑↓けんこう↓の↑価値↑↓かち↓が|↑解↑↓ほどけ↓る|。
sdata.e: It is not until you get sick that you realize the value of good health.

sdata.j: トムはフランス↑語↑↓ご↓が|↑解↑↓わか↓る|。
↑病気↑↓びょうき↓になってはじめて↑健康↑↓けんこう↓の↑価値↑↓かち↓が|↑解↑↓ほどけ↓る|。
sdata.e: It's not until you get sick that you realize the value of good health.

sdata.e: It isn't until you get sick that you realize the value of good health.
